Name: ACE
Topics: Atari ST, Amiga, C64, ZX Spectrum, Amstrad CPC, and newly released machines

Name: Amiga Action
Topics: Amiga games magazine which merged with Amiga Computing in 1996.

Name: Amiga Active
Topics: Amiga magazine with CU Amiga staff.

Name: Amiga Computing
Topics: Amiga hardware magazine with a games section called Gamer. When Amiga Action was incorporated it became the games section.

Name: Amiga Survivor
Topics: Amiga magazine which started life as a fanzine called The Domain.

Name: Amiga User International
Topics: Amiga magazine later published by AUI Limited.

Name: Amtix!
Topics: Amstrad CPC games magazine; merged with Computing With The Amstrad.
